Posts.Content: I am a 5 year breast cancer survivor and am terrifed in having mammograms. I hate the radiation plus they really hurt due to the scarring the radiation did to my breast. The axiety is so intense that I am considering not having a mammogram. Any suggestions?
Posts.Title: Breast Cnacer and Mammogram

Posts.Content: I was wondering if anyone has heard of a blood test (AMAS) for cancer screening or thermography. I would like to take a more holistic path for breast cancer follow up.
Posts.Title: Breast Cnacer and Mammogram
